featured.text: Thomas Jefferson held the first inaugural open house in 1805; many of those who attended the swearing-in ceremony at the U.S. Capitol simply followed him home.

definition.zh_def: 使用粗俗或冒犯性的語言，通常表達憤怒或不滿。
definition.en_def: The act of using offensive or vulgar language, often to express anger or frustration.
definition.example: He was swearing loudly after stubbing his toe.
